Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

MILES_DLS_CLOSE_FLAGS

The basic type MILES_DLS_CLOSE_FLAGS specifies optional closing flags to AIL_DLS_close.

Fundamental Values

 Value  Description
 RETAIN_DLS_COLLECTION retain the DLS data that was downloaded.
 RETURN_TO_BOOTUP_STATE return the DLS hardware to its default boot up state.
 RETURN_TO_GM_ONLY_STATE return the DLS hardware to General MIDI mode.
 DLS_COMPACT_MEMORY after unloading, compact the hardware memory.


Group: DLS Services
Related Functions: AIL_DLS_close
